mapper.select: select sno, title, writer, writingtime, view_cnt FROM stbl ORDER by sno desc
mapper.insert: insert into stbl(title, writer, content) values(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update stbl set view_cnt=view_cnt+1 WHERE sno=#{sno}
mapper.select: select sno, title, writer, writingtime, view_cnt FROM stbl WHERE title LIKE concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') ORDER by sno desc
